projects.name: B-Tap
description: A mobile app that utilizes the Nearby Connections API for instant attendance tracking in classes
Employs an advertise-discover communication model for 1-to-N communication
Teacher initiates attendance by selecting semester, subject, and slot, then begins advertising; students discover the advertiser (teacher) by just tapping a button.
Upon detection, student devices verify data and record attendance
Presented at the IoT Expo by AICTE SPICES
